name: DoubleBarDecorator
description: A double bar decoration for connections, typically used to indicate parallel lines or equality symbols at connection endpoints.

functions.name: paint
functions.description:
Draw a double bar decoration.


        |     | [width , height/2]
        |     |
[0,0]   |     |                          (Connection)
   +====|=====|==========================
        |     |
        |     |
        |     | [width ,-height/2]
     bar1   bar2
       <----->
        width (gap)

parameters.name: paper
parameters.description: the raphael paper object for the paint operation

constructor.name: DoubleBarDecorator
